infos.value: Hehe...as one would expect of our commander.
They're not the real threat—Muraga is.
We should perhaps consider retreat as an option.
You may be right.
Hey, Oldoa.
You said so yourself.
That Muraga was no longer human.
...So what do you intend to do?
What are you implying?
No matter if you win or lose here, at this rate...there’s no future left for Fennes.
There’s no getting through to that...thing...anymore.
If we don’t defeat him, the next person he’ll devour is...
I know that. I do...
But even so...what can I do?
Should I kill King Muraga to protect Fennes?
I could never do that!
You cannot mean...you would let Muraga...
If King Muraga wishes to devour me, then so be it.
Do not say such a thing...
You would not understand.
I will kill you all, even if I must become King Muraga’s very flesh and blood to do it.
